parameters.name: T.Kind
parameters.description: Kind represents the type of the API object.

parameters.name: T.APIVersion
parameters.description: APIVersion defines the version of the API object.

parameters.name: O.Tenant
parameters.description:
Tenant is global namespace isolation for various objects. This can be automatically
filled in many cases based on the tenant a user, who created the object, belongs go.

parameters.name: O.Namespace
parameters.description: Namespace of the object, for scoped objects.

parameters.name: O.ResourceVersion
parameters.description: Resource version in the object store. This can only be set by the server.

parameters.name: O.UUID
parameters.description: UUID is the unique identifier for the object. This can only be set by the server.

parameters.name: Spec.QuorumNodes
parameters.description:
QuorumNodes contains the list of hostnames for nodes configured to be quorum
nodes in the cluster.

parameters.name: Spec.VirtualIP
parameters.description:
VirtualIP is the IP address for managing the cluster. It will be hosted by
the winner of election between quorum nodes.

parameters.name: Spec.NTPServers
parameters.description: NTPServers contains the list of NTP servers for the cluster.

parameters.name: Spec.DNSSubDomain
parameters.description: DNSSubDomain is the DNS subdomain for the default tenant.

parameters.name: Status.Leader
parameters.description: Leader contains the node name of the cluster leader.

parameters.name: T.Kind
parameters.description: Kind represents the type of the API object.

parameters.name: T.APIVersion
parameters.description: APIVersion defines the version of the API object.

parameters.name: L.ResourceVersion
parameters.description: Resource version of object store at the time of list generation.

Tenant is global namespace isolation for various objects. This can be automatically
filled in many cases based on the tenant a user, who created the object, belongs go.

ResourceVersion.description: Resource version of object store at the time of list generation.

apiListMeta.description: ListMeta contains the metadata for list of objects.

Name.description: Name of the object, unique within a Namespace for scoped objects.

Tenant.description:
Tenant is global namespace isolation for various objects. This can be automatically
filled in many cases based on the tenant a user, who created the object, belongs go.

Namespace.description: Namespace of the object, for scoped objects.

ResourceVersion.description: Resource version in the object store. This can only be set by the server.

UUID.description: UUID is the unique identifier for the object. This can only be set by the server.

apiObjectMeta.description: ObjectMeta contains metadata that all objects stored in kvstore must have.

Kind.description: Kind represents the type of the API object.

APIVersion.description: APIVersion defines the version of the API object.

apiTypeMeta.description: TypeMeta contains the metadata about kind and version for all API objects.

Spec.description: Spec contains the configuration of the cluster.

Status.description: Status contains the current state of the cluster.

QuorumNodes.description:
QuorumNodes contains the list of hostnames for nodes configured to be quorum
nodes in the cluster.

VirtualIP.description:
VirtualIP is the IP address for managing the cluster. It will be hosted by
the winner of election between quorum nodes.

NTPServers.description: NTPServers contains the list of NTP servers for the cluster.

DNSSubDomain.description: DNSSubDomain is the DNS subdomain for the default tenant.

cmdClusterSpec.description: ClusterSpec contains the configuration of the cluster.

Leader.description: Leader contains the node name of the cluster leader.

cmdClusterStatus.description: ClusterStatus contains the current state of the Cluster.

Spec.description: Spec contains the configuration of the node.

Status.description: Status contains the current state of the node.

cmdNode.description: Node is representation of a single node in the cluster.

Items.description: Items is the list of nodes in the cluster.

cmdNodeList.description: NodeList is representation of all nodes in the cluster.

cmdNodeSpec.description: NodeSpec contains the configuration of the node.

cmdNodeStatus.description: NodeStatus contains the current state of the node.
